Description: Our security system have detected malware on your company computer. It is imperative that we address this issue immediately to prevent any further harm to our systems and data.

Description Title: OS versions are out of date
Description: Upon a recent review conducted by our IT security team, it has come to our attention that several of our company computers are running outdated operating system (OS) versions. As you may know, using outdated OS versions poses significant security risks to our organization, as these systems are more vulnerable to cyber attacks and exploits.

Description Title: Access control practices are not optimal
Description: Following a comprehensive review conducted by our IT security team, it has been identified that our current access control practices are not meeting the optimal standards required for ensuring the security and integrity of our data any system.
